kpi.name: M1000C159

kpi_info.title: RB RELEASE BY PBS DUE TO INTERFERENCE CONGESTION
kpi_info.use: The number of released radio bearers by priority-based scheduling (PBS) due to uplink interference or downlink power congestion reasons. UPDATED:When the radio bearer is successfully released.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB RELEASE BY PBS DUE TO INTERFERENCE CONGESTION
